(c) Scheme illustrating that the bpydb2- ligand can be reduced to a 3-connected node. (d) Schematic representation of the (3,6)-connected single alb-topology framework.

cln_elements.content: Fig. 3 (a) ORTEP drawing of the asymmetric unit in 3 (50% probability ellipsoids). Hydrogen atoms attached to carbon atoms and lattice DMF molecules are omitted for clarity. Symmetry codes: A = −x,1 − y,−z; B = 1/2 − x,−1/2 + y,−1/2 − z; C = −1/2 + x,3/2 − y,1/2 + z. (b) Schematic diagram illustrating stacking of two dimensional (4,4)-sql networks in 3. (c) Schematic representation of the novel 4-connected network.

(c) Perspective view of the stacking fashion of the 2D layers along the a axis. (d) 3D supramolecular architecture containing 1D channels.

metadata.title: Syntheses, structures and physical properties of transition metal–organic frameworks assembled from trigonal heterofunctional ligands
